properties.name: Form Elements
Element type
properties.description: Here you can choose the type of element to add to your form, for instance, short or long text, dropdown, checkboxes, etc.

properties.name: Label
properties.description: Name your element. The label will be displayed above the field.
properties.groups: text email phone url number textarea checkbox datepicker scaleStars scaleNumbers scaleThumb radio scaleSmiles dropdown file hidden

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Name your group. The name will be displayed in the progress panel.

properties.name: Placeholder
properties.description: Placeholder will be displayed inside the field. Use it as an example of input data or to demonstrate the required format. Also, to use as an alternative label, enter element name here.
properties.groups: text email phone textarea url number datepicker dropdown

properties.name: Options
properties.description: List the options to choose from.

properties.name: Min
properties.description: Set the lowest scale value.

properties.name: Max
properties.description: Set the highest scale value.

properties.name: Left caption
properties.description: Set the caption for the lowest scale value.

properties.name: Right caption
properties.description: Set the caption for the highest scale value.

properties.name: File button text
properties.description: Set the text for button in file upload control.

properties.name: File drag text
properties.description: Set the text for drag in file upload control.

properties.name: Text
properties.description: Enter your text here.

properties.name: Heading
properties.description: Enter your heading text here.

properties.name: Date and time
properties.description: Select the required data: date, date and time, time.

properties.name: Date format
properties.description: Select date input format.

properties.name: Time format
properties.description: Select time input format.

properties.name: Stars Count
properties.description: Set the maximum number of stars.

properties.name: Make this field required
properties.description: Set this to ON to make a field required. The user will have to fill this field before submitting the form. Tip: Too many required fields decrease the chances of submitting a form.
properties.groups: text email phone url number textarea checkbox datepicker scaleStars scaleNumbers scaleThumb radio scaleSmiles dropdown file

properties.name: Description
properties.description: Add a text to your element, if required. The description will be displayed below the label.
properties.groups: group text email phone url number textarea checkbox datepicker scaleStars scaleNumbers scaleThumb radio scaleSmiles dropdown file

properties.name: Column layout
properties.description: Use this option to organize the form elements in columns. Choose the same value for several elements that you need to arrange into columns.
properties.groups: text email phone url number textarea caption datepicker scaleStars scaleNumbers scaleThumb scaleSmiles dropdown

properties.name: Columns
properties.description: Use this setting to arrange the options into columns.

properties.name: Allowed file types
properties.description: Select allowed to upload file types.

properties.name: Specify allowed file types
properties.description: Select allowed to upload file types.

properties.name: Max file size (MB)
properties.description: Set maximum file size (MB).

properties.name: Elements
properties.description: Add elements to the group same way you did to the form.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: This option allows to choose one of the 5 predefined form styles. Choose the one that suits you best.

properties.name: Field ID

properties.groups: text email phone url number textarea checkbox datepicker scaleStars scaleNumbers scaleThumb radio scaleSmiles dropdown

properties.description: Build your form with the elements you need.

defaultValue.label: Message
defaultValue.placeholder: Tell us briefly about your needs

properties.name: Show form header
properties.description: Show/Hide the form header.

properties.name: Header title
properties.description: This title will be displayed above the form.

properties.name: Header text
properties.defaultValue: Leave your message and we'll get back to you shortly.
properties.description: Here you can add a text that will be displayed under the title, above the form. Enter any relevant information - response times, calls to action, any other specific information.

properties.name: Header picture
properties.description: Paste the URL of the image you want to display left of the title. You can display a message icon, a company logo or the picture of the contact.

staticHtml.content:
You can use form field values as mail-tags in the settings. The following mail-tags are available:
  • [form-data] outputs all form fields in a list, in name and value format.
  • [website-url] outputs the website URL the message has come from.
  • [page-url] outputs the page URL the message has come from.
  • [field-id] outputs the value of a specified field in your form. You will get each field's id in its settings.

properties.name: To
properties.description: Set the emails to forward the messages to.

properties.name: Copy (Cc)
properties.description: Set the emails to forward copy the messages to.

properties.name: Hidden Copy (Bcc)
properties.description: Set the emails to forward hidden copy the messages to.

properties.name: Action After Submit
Action after form submission
properties.description: Choose what happens after a user submits the form: display thank you message, redirect to a specific page or simply hide form.

properties.name: Thank you message
properties.defaultValue: Your message was successfully sent! We will reply to you shortly.
properties.description: This option allows you to set the text to display after the form was submitted.

properties.name: Thank you message button text
properties.description: This option allows you to set the text for the button that closes the thank you message.

properties.name: Redirect URL
properties.description: Set the URL to redirect the user to after form submission.
Choose what happens after a user submits the form: display thank you message, redirect to a specific page or simply hide form.

properties.name: Submit button text
properties.description: Customize Submit button text. Tip: Don't make the text too long.

properties.name: Please, fill all the required fields
properties.defaultValue: Please, fill all the required fields

properties.name: Please, fill all the fields correctly
properties.defaultValue: Please, fill all the fields correctly

properties.name: Please, set the email to send messages to
properties.defaultValue: Please, set the email to send messages to

properties.name: Weekdays Shorthand
properties.defaultValue:
Sun
Mon
Tue

properties.defaultValue:

properties.name: Show multistep form progress bar
properties.description: Turn this option on to show remaining steps.

properties.name: Recaptcha Type
properties.description: Select reCaptcha type.
properties.caption: Attention: Even when reCaptcha is set to invisible, Google may require a visitor to go through verification process. Google makes this decision based on user behaviour.

properties.name: Google Auth

token.confirm: This action will disconnect your form from Google Sheet, proceed?

properties.caption: To connect your form with Google Sheet you must authorize with Google

properties.name: Layout
properties.description: Select one of the predefined layouts. Default - use this layout to embed your form as is. Boxed - use the boxed layout to make sure your form stands out against the rest of the page content. Floating - this layout adds a floating button that opens the form when you click on it. This button scrolls along with your page and is always available for the user.

properties.name: Floating Button Icon
properties.description: Select the icon from the list to display on floating button.

properties.name: Width (px, %, auto)
properties.description: Set form width in pixels or percents. Set "auto" to make the form full width.

properties.name: Style
properties.description: This option allows to choose one of the 5 predefined form styles. Choose the one that suits you best.

properties.name: Main Color
properties.description: Choose the color to be used in your form: Submit button, progress bar, active element etc.
